messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Interview!
messages.msgSnippet: * Our fun is a result of our lives, not necessarily of homeschooling. You could say that every moment of every day is part of our homeschooling. It never
messages.messageBody:
* "Our fun is a result of our lives, not necessarily of homeschooling. You
could say that every moment of every day is part of our homeschooling. It
never stops, so long as our lives continue.*"

Brilliant :-) I am a huge fan.

Faith

messages.messageBody:
I thought I'd engage in some shameless self-promotion and post the link to my interview with Debbie at Homeschooling is Freedom. It was a lot of fun and I'm really excited about it! Enjoy!

http://homeschoolingisfreedom.blogspot.com/2009/06/drop-of-hat-flexibility-heather.html
